plot_RD_cl

Source: R/reduceDimension_plot.R
plot_RD_cl.Rd

plot_RD_cl

plot_RD_cl(
  rd.dat,
  cl,
  cl.color = NULL,
  cl.label = NULL,
  cex = 0.15,
  fn.size = 2,
  alpha.val = NULL,
  show.legend = FALSE,
  legend.size = 2,
  label.center = TRUE,
  bg = "blank",
  fn.color = "black",
  na.val = "grey60",
  no.shape = TRUE,
  ncol = 4,
  shift.x = 0,
  shift.y = 0,
  raster = F,
  dpi = 300
)

Arguments

rd.dat
cl
cl.color
cl.label
cex
fn.size
alpha.val
show.legend
legend.size
label.center
bg
fn.color
raster

whether to rasterize the scatterplot. Default=F

Value

value.
